79127.summary: Some customers in the Pines area of Red Deer are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
79127.title: June 26 - Red Deer (Pines) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
